import{CREATE,DELETE,UPDATE,FETCH_ALL,LIKE}from'../constants/actionTypes.js';export default(function(){let posts=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:[];let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;//changes done here directly exports the value by default
switch(action.type){case DELETE:console.log('deleted');return posts.filter(post=>post._id!==action.payload);case UPDATE:console.log('updating card in reducers');return posts.map(post=>post._id===action.payload._id?action.payload:post);case LIKE:console.log('updating card in reducers');return posts.map(post=>post._id===action.payload._id?action.payload:post);case CREATE:console.log('creating card in reducers');return[...posts,action.payload];case FETCH_ALL:return action.payload;default:return posts;}});
